activities.name: Walking the City Walls
activities.description: Explore the complete 1.94 km circuit of Dubrovnik's medieval walls, offering spectacular views of the Old Town and Adriatic Sea.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring provides pleasant temperatures and fewer crowds, making it ideal for this iconic activity.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to avoid queues and start early to avoid the midday heat.

activities.name: Cable Car to Mount Srđ
activities.description: Take the cable car to the top of Mount Srđ for panoramic views of Dubrovnik, the Adriatic Sea, and surrounding islands.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring offers clear visibility and comfortable temperatures for enjoying the spectacular views.
activities.booking_tips: Visit during sunset for the most dramatic views and photography opportunities.

activities.name: Visit to Lokrum Island
activities.description: Explore the beautiful Lokrum Island, a nature reserve with botanical gardens, peacocks, and swimming spots.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is perfect for island visits with mild weather and blooming gardens.
activities.booking_tips: Take the first boat of the day to avoid crowds and bring swimwear for the Dead Sea lake.

activities.name: Game of Thrones Walking Tour
activities.description: Discover filming locations from the popular TV series throughout the Old Town, including the Red Keep and King's Landing scenes.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring weather is ideal for walking tours with comfortable temperatures and good lighting for photos.
activities.booking_tips: Book in advance, especially for popular guides, and bring comfortable walking shoes.

activities.name: Beach Day at Lapad
activities.description: Enjoy the beautiful pebble beaches of Lapad with crystal-clear waters, perfect for swimming and sunbathing.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring offers warm enough temperatures for swimming while avoiding the summer crowds.
activities.booking_tips: Bring beach towels and arrive early to secure a good spot, especially on weekends.

activities.name: Dubrovnik Summer Festival Preview
activities.description: Experience early performances and preparations for the famous Dubrovnik Summer Festival, which begins in July.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring sees the beginning of cultural season preparations and early performances.
activities.booking_tips: Check the festival schedule for early events and book tickets in advance.

activities.name: Wine Tasting Experience
activities.description: Sample local Croatian wines, particularly Plavac Mali and Pošip, at wine bars throughout the Old Town.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is ideal for wine tasting as the weather is pleasant for both indoor and outdoor venues.
activities.booking_tips: Visit D'vino Wine Bar for an extensive selection of Croatian wines and knowledgeable staff.

activities.name: Photography Tour
activities.description: Capture the beauty of Dubrovnik's architecture, sea views, and historic sites with professional photography guidance.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring light is perfect for photography with golden hour providing ideal conditions.
activities.booking_tips: Book a professional photographer for the best results and access to exclusive locations.

activities.name: Market Shopping in Gruž
activities.description: Explore the daily market in Gruž for fresh local produce, seafood, and authentic Croatian products.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring markets are bustling with fresh seasonal produce and local specialties.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early for the best selection and bring cash for local vendors.

activities.name: Dubrovnik Summer Festival
activities.description: Experience the world-famous Dubrovnik Summer Festival featuring classical music, theater, and dance performances in historic venues.
activities.seasonal_notes: The festival runs from mid-July to late August, showcasing culture in stunning historic settings.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets well in advance as performances sell out quickly, especially for popular shows.

activities.name: Beach Hopping
activities.description: Visit multiple beaches including Banje Beach, Copacabana, and hidden coves for swimming and water sports.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers perfect conditions for beach activities with warm water and long daylight hours.
activities.booking_tips: Start early to avoid crowds and bring water shoes for pebble beaches.

activities.name: Boat Tour to Elaphiti Islands
activities.description: Take a boat tour to the beautiful Elaphiti Islands (Koločep, Lopud, Šipan) for swimming, hiking, and island exploration.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer provides ideal conditions for island hopping with calm seas and warm weather.
activities.booking_tips: Book tours in advance and bring snorkeling gear for underwater exploration.

activities.name: Water Sports at Copacabana Beach
activities.description: Enjoy water sports including jet skiing, paddleboarding, and parasailing at the popular Copacabana Beach.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer offers perfect conditions for water sports with warm water and calm seas.
activities.booking_tips: Book activities in advance, especially for popular sports like jet skiing.

activities.name: Sunset Dinner at Restaurant 360°
activities.description: Enjoy fine dining with panoramic views at Restaurant 360°, located on the city walls with spectacular sunset views.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings are perfect for rooftop dining with warm temperatures and stunning sunsets.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve a table well in advance, especially for sunset dining, and request a window seat.

activities.name: Café Buža Cliff Jumping
activities.description: Visit the famous cliff bar Café Buža for drinks and the opportunity to jump into the crystal-clear Adriatic Sea.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer provides warm water temperatures perfect for swimming and cliff jumping.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early to secure a spot and be cautious when jumping - check water depth first.

activities.name: Open-Air Cinema at Fort Lovrijenac
activities.description: Watch classic films under the stars at the historic Fort Lovrijenac with the Old Town as a backdrop.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings are perfect for outdoor cinema with warm temperatures and late sunsets.
activities.booking_tips: Bring a blanket or cushion and arrive early to secure a good viewing spot.

activities.name: Seafood Cooking Class
activities.description: Learn to cook traditional Croatian seafood dishes using fresh local ingredients and traditional methods.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer provides the freshest seafood and ideal conditions for culinary learning.
activities.booking_tips: Book classes in advance, especially for popular instructors, and check if market visits are included.

activities.name: Night Swimming at Banje Beach
activities.description: Experience the magic of swimming under the stars at Banje Beach with the illuminated Old Town as a backdrop.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer nights offer warm water temperatures perfect for night swimming.
activities.booking_tips: Bring a towel and be aware of beach access hours and safety considerations.

activities.name: Historical Walking Tour
activities.description: Explore Dubrovnik's rich history with guided tours of the Old Town, focusing on the Republic of Ragusa era.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn provides comfortable temperatures for walking tours with fewer crowds than summer.
activities.booking_tips: Book tours in advance and choose knowledgeable guides for deeper historical insights.

activities.name: Wine Tasting at D'vino Wine Bar
activities.description: Sample Croatian wines including Plavac Mali, Graševina, and Teran at the renowned D'vino Wine Bar.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is harvest season, making it ideal for wine tasting with fresh vintages available.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve a table in advance and ask for wine pairing recommendations with local cheeses.

activities.name: Visit to Rector's Palace
activities.description: Explore the historic Rector's Palace, once the seat of the Republic of Ragusa, with its impressive architecture and exhibits.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn's cooler days are perfect for indoor museum visits with fewer tourists.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to avoid queues and consider a guided tour for historical context.

activities.name: Photography Workshop
activities.description: Join a photography workshop to capture Dubrovnik's autumn beauty with professional guidance and tips.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn light is perfect for photography with golden hour providing ideal conditions.
activities.booking_tips: Book workshops in advance and bring your own camera equipment.

activities.name: Cable Car Views of Autumn Colors
activities.description: Take the cable car to Mount Srđ to enjoy panoramic views of Dubrovnik and the surrounding autumn landscape.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn offers beautiful fall colors and comfortable temperatures for enjoying the views.
activities.booking_tips: Visit during golden hour for the most dramatic lighting and photography opportunities.

activities.name: Local Market Shopping
activities.description: Explore local markets for autumn produce, including fresh figs, grapes, and seasonal Croatian specialties.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn markets are filled with seasonal produce and local harvest specialties.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early for the best selection and bring cash for local vendors.

activities.name: Traditional Croatian Cooking Class
activities.description: Learn to cook traditional Croatian dishes using seasonal ingredients and authentic recipes.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn's harvest provides abundant ingredients for learning traditional Croatian cuisine.
activities.booking_tips: Book classes in advance and check if market visits are included in the experience.

activities.name: Beach Walks in Mild Weather
activities.description: Enjoy peaceful walks along Dubrovnik's beaches with comfortable autumn temperatures and fewer crowds.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn provides ideal conditions for beach walks with mild weather and beautiful light.
activities.booking_tips: Bring comfortable walking shoes and a camera for beautiful autumn beach photography.

activities.name: Visit to Dubrovnik Cathedral
activities.description: Explore the beautiful Dubrovnik Cathedral with its impressive architecture and religious art collections.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn offers a peaceful atmosphere for visiting religious sites with fewer tourists.
activities.booking_tips: Check opening hours and dress appropriately for religious sites.

activities.name: Peaceful Old Town Exploration
activities.description: Explore the Old Town during winter when crowds are minimal, allowing for intimate discovery of historic sites.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter offers the most peaceful experience of the Old Town with minimal tourist crowds.
activities.booking_tips: Dress warmly and wear comfortable walking shoes for exploring the limestone streets.

activities.name: Café Culture in Old Town
activities.description: Experience authentic Croatian café culture in historic cafés throughout the Old Town, enjoying local coffee and pastries.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is perfect for indoor café culture, providing warmth and authentic local experience.
activities.booking_tips: Visit Café Festival for traditional Croatian coffee and beautiful terrace views.

activities.name: Cable Car Winter Views
activities.description: Take the cable car to Mount Srđ for spectacular winter views of Dubrovnik and the Adriatic Sea.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter provides clear visibility and dramatic lighting for photography from the mountain.
activities.booking_tips: Check weather conditions before visiting and dress warmly for the mountain top.

activities.name: Local Market Shopping
activities.description: Explore local markets for winter produce, fresh seafood, and traditional Croatian products with fewer crowds.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter markets offer authentic local experience with seasonal products and local vendors.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early for the best selection and bring cash for local vendors.

activities.name: Traditional Croatian Dining
activities.description: Enjoy traditional Croatian cuisine at local restaurants, featuring hearty winter dishes and local specialties.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is ideal for enjoying hearty Croatian dishes and local comfort food.
activities.booking_tips: Try traditional dishes like peka (slow-cooked meat) and black risotto at local konobas.

activities.name: Photography in Winter Light
activities.description: Capture Dubrovnik's beauty in winter light with dramatic skies and minimal crowds for unique photography opportunities.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter provides dramatic lighting and atmospheric conditions perfect for photography.
activities.booking_tips: Bring warm clothing and arrive early for the best light conditions.

activities.name: Indoor Cultural Activities
activities.description: Participate in indoor cultural activities including museum visits, art exhibitions, and historical presentations.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is perfect for indoor cultural activities, providing warmth and educational experiences.
activities.booking_tips: Check museum schedules and book tickets online to avoid queues.

activities.name: Historical Museum Visits
activities.description: Explore Dubrovnik's museums including the Maritime Museum and Ethnographic Museum with minimal crowds.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter offers peaceful museum visits with fewer tourists and comfortable indoor temperatures.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase museum passes for multiple visits and check opening hours in advance.

activities.name: Seafood Dining at Local Konobas
activities.description: Enjoy fresh seafood at traditional konobas (taverns) featuring local Adriatic specialties and warm hospitality.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter provides the freshest seafood and authentic local dining experiences.
activities.booking_tips: Try local specialties like grilled fish and seafood risotto at family-run konobas.
